author: mischnic
message:
Switch back to upstream lightningcss (#80863)

These are merged and released now: 
- https://github.com/parcel-bundler/lightningcss/pull/1015
- https://github.com/parcel-bundler/lightningcss/pull/1011

files.patch:
@@ -624,6 +624,9 @@ name = "bitflags"
 version = "2.9.0"
 source = "registry+https://github.com/rust-lang/crates.io-index"
 checksum = "5c8214115b7bf84099f1309324e63141d4c5d7cc26862f97a0a857dbefe165bd"
+dependencies = [
+ "serde",
+]
 
 [[package]]
 name = "bitreader"
